html:
Jan 27 (Reuters) - UNIVERSAL MUSIC GROUP NV UMG.AS:

  • UNIVERSAL MUSIC GROUP EXPANDS RELATIONSHIP ACROSS AMAZON MUSIC AND TWITCH

  • TWITCH TO COLLABORATE WITH UMG ON ORIGINAL CONTENT FOR LIVE STREAMING SERVICE

  • TWITCH HAS ALSO AGREED TO PROVIDE COMMERCIAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR UMG AND ITS ARTISTS TO ENGAGE DIRECTLY WITH FANS THROUGH ITS SUITE OF PRODUCTS

  • ADDITIONALLY, TWITCH AND UMG WILL WORK TOGETHER TO FOSTER NEW INNOVATIVE OPPORTUNITIES FOR ARTISTS AND LABELS TO CREATIVELY AND COMMERCIALLY ENGAGE WITH THEIR FANS AND NEW AUDIENCES

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: UMG.AS


(Gdansk Newsroom)
